title: What are the techniques for developing clairvoyance through hypnosis?
first_phrase: This text focuses on the development of psychic abilities through hypnosis, specifically the ability to see without the use of physical sight, also known as clairvoyance. The author provides guidance on how to train the subject with suggestions, and gradually progress to asking for specific information such as the names of people and objects or descriptions of a specific location. The author also discusses the process of predicting the future, and how to project oneself out of the body to be seen and heard at a distance. The text then explores various techniques used by famous hypnotists to induce hypnosis in their subjects, emphasizing the importance of a patient and supportive approach.
